issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

[INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/17/11 08:08 5d1f301). wifi ipad 3.2

1.KS-iPad > split view w/ nav group
2.hold in landscape
3.tap Flash pop-over (will do nothing)
4.rotate to portrait and tap "flash popover again"

results: fails

not a regression as this test has always behaved this way.

{html}
fields.summary: iPad "flash popover" is failing silently after tapping in landscape, then tapping in portrait

comments.body: I cannot reproduce this in the current build
Tested on iPad 3.2.2 and iPad2 4.3.3 with 1.7.2.v20110711111041 pop over works after all different orientations
